remarks: Outer transitivity law for betweenness.  Left-hand side of Theorem 3.1 of [Schwabhauser] p. 30.  (Contributed by Scott Fenton, 12-Jun-2013.)
statement: btwnouttr2 $p |- ( ( N e. NN /\ ( A e. ( EE ` N ) /\ B e. ( EE ` N ) ) /\ ( C e. ( EE ` N ) /\ D e. ( EE ` N ) ) ) -> ( ( B =/= C /\ B Btwn <. A , C >. /\ C Btwn <. B , D >. ) -> C Btwn <. A , D >. ) ) $.
